channel.title: Need help on a few things!
channel.description: Ok first things first. How can you change bonuses for items? Such as white and initiate. Another thing how can I change the price of an object such as a santa hat costing more then 200gp......... A last thing is I need a combat timer so if your in/been in melee you need to wait 10 seconds to log out! Please help! I have no idea what to code/voids!

item.title: Need help on a few things!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

I can’t find out what to change though for the bonuses and price… And for the combat timer…What?? and where do i add it?

Read full topic
